statements: SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionEquipment
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM WasteCollectionEquipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC
SELECT equipment_id, quantity FROM WasteCollectionEquipment WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionEquipment WHERE reorder_threshold < 5
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM WasteCollectionEquipment ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionEquipment WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM WasteCollectionEquipment WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, equipment_name DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, reorder_threshold FROM WasteCollectionEquipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%bin%'
SELECT * FROM WasteCollectionEquipment WHERE reorder_threshold <= 10 AND quantity >= 50 ORDER BY equipment_id ASC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity AS total_quantity FROM WasteCollectionEquipment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_id, location FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM reordering_history ORDER BY reorder_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, quantity_ordered FROM waste_collection_equipment JOIN reordering_history ON waste_collection_equipment.equipment_id = reordering_history.equipment_id WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, location FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Trash Bin';
SELECT * FROM reordering_history WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY reorder_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM waste_collection_equipment JOIN reordering_history ON waste_collection_equipment.equipment_id = reordering_history.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_equipment;
SELECT name, category, quantity FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, name, location FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE category = 'Bins';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, name, location, contact_number FROM waste_collection_suppliers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_equipment;
SELECT name, category, quantity FROM waste_collection_equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT supplier_id, name, location FROM waste_collection_suppliers WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM waste_collection_orders GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_location;
SELECT equipment_id, location FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT inventory_id, quantity_available FROM inventory WHERE quantity_reserved < quantity_available;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment JOIN inventory ON equipment.equipment_id = inventory.equipment_id WHERE quantity_available > 0;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.equipment_id = inventory.equipment_id WHERE quantity_ordered > quantity_reserved);
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_ordered > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM waste_collection_equipment;
SELECT id, location FROM equipment_tracking ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_reordering WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT location_name, address, contact_person FROM locations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM equipment_tracking ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location, last_reorder_date FROM waste_collection_equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_id, SUM(usage_duration) AS total_duration FROM equipment_usage GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING total_duration > 100;
